# Interactive component

```{r, fig.height=15}
df1_count <- df1_count %>% dplyr::select(Tags,year, TotalViews, TagCount, TotalComments, AcceptedAnswers, TagRank) %>%
  mutate(year = as.factor(year))
if(interactive()) {


  #   in these we supply a function for our color
  parcoords(
    df1_count
    , color = list(
       colorBy = "TagRank"
       , colorScale = "scaleOrdinal"
       , colorScheme = "schemeCategory10"
    )
    , withD3 = TRUE
  )

  if(require('ggplot2', quietly = TRUE)) {
  parcoords(
    df1_count
    ,rownames = FALSE
    ,brushMode = "1d-axes"
    ,reorderable = TRUE
    ,queue = TRUE
    ,color= list(
       colorBy="TagRank"
       , colorScale = "scaleOrdinal"
       , colorScheme = "schemeCategory10"
    )
    ,withD3 = TRUE
  )
  }
}
```
